returns.hasVoted: True if vote has been recorded

params.voteData_: Processed vote data from weight strategy

hasVoted(uint256,address,bytes).notice: Checks if a vote has already been recorded

initialize(address[]).notice: Initializes the vote tracker with authorized callers

recordVote(uint256,address,bytes).notice: Records that a vote has been cast
